content: The aquarium options sound great, and I think my niece would enjoy any of them. I'll have to check their websites to see which one would be the best fit for us. And thanks for the restaurant recommendations! I'm definitely going to check out The Wharf Restaurant and The Crab Shack. Fresh seafood is always a must when you're at the beach. By the way, speaking of family, I recently attended my cousin's wedding, and it was great to catch up with my relatives. Have you got any tips on how to stay in touch with family members who live far away?
